core_meaning: Sextile between Moon and Jupiter opens opportunity/skill. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Public reception, brand sentiment, consistency.  Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Bonding, nurturance, emotional safety.  Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Cyclic cashflow, consumer sentiment.  Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Hydration, sleep, digestion; stress sensitivity.  Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Moon Sextile Jupiter
en.core: Sextile between Moon and Jupiter opens opportunity/skill. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

hi.title: Moon Sextile Jupiter (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Moon और Jupiter का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
